title: test: easy performance wins
body:
There are a few easy performance wins available for `go run run.go`. I pulled them
together in https://golang.org/cl/72590045.

On my laptop, it decreases wall time to run tests from 35.8s to 22.5s (-37%). On a
Raspberry Pi, wall time drops from 22m55s to 18m55s (-17%, but also -4m!). Further
optimizations along the same lines offer only minimal further improvements.

Filing this issue so that it doesn't get forgotten in the next three months. Even if for
some reason we wanted this for Go 1.3, we should wait until issue #7344 is resolved, as
this CL masks that issue.
